name: part_008
file: tmp_【#⁠湊あくあ5周年LIVE】Dreamy day 【湊あくあ⧸ホロライブ】 [c9VW0E2Unl4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Colorful' by Minato Aqua and Usada Pekora concludes.
A monologue by Minato Aqua reflecting on her journey over the past 5 years.
Minato Aqua performs 'Aqua Iro Palette' on a moving carriage.

subtitles.original: 染まることが出来るから夢叶えよう
subtitles.english: Because we can be stained, let's make our dreams come true

subtitles.original: ずっと独りぼっちだった
subtitles.english: I was always all alone.

subtitles.original: 孤独だった
subtitles.english: I was lonely.

subtitles.original: 寂しかった
subtitles.english: I was sad.

subtitles.original: でも今は独りじゃない
subtitles.english: But now, I'm not alone.

subtitles.original: 大切な仲間たちがいる
subtitles.english: I have precious friends.

subtitles.original: 応援してくれてるファンの皆がいる
subtitles.english: I have all the fans who support me.

subtitles.original: 昔の私 もう大丈夫だよ
subtitles.english: To the me of the past... it's okay now.

subtitles.original: 私はもう独りじゃない
subtitles.english: I'm not alone anymore.

subtitles.original: だから 大丈夫
subtitles.english: So, it's okay.

subtitles.original: 銀河一アイドル 湊あくあ
subtitles.english: The galaxy's number one idol, Minato Aqua.

subtitles.original: 世界中 あくあ色に染まれ！
subtitles.english: Let the whole world be stained in Aqua's color!

subtitles.original: 何をしてもしどろもどろで
subtitles.english: No matter what I do, I'm flustered...

subtitles.original: 何かとミスしてばっか
subtitles.english: ...and I keep making mistakes.

subtitles.original: ダメダメな私だって
subtitles.english: Even for a useless me like this...

subtitles.original: 出来ることがあるの
subtitles.english: ...there are things I can do.

subtitles.original: 凹んで悲しくたって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm feeling down and sad...

subtitles.original: 笑顔にしてあげるんだ
subtitles.english: ...I'll make you smile.

subtitles.original: ここにいるから早く
subtitles.english: I'm right here, so hurry up...

subtitles.original: 私を見つけてね
subtitles.english: ...and find me.

subtitles.original: いつでも隣にいるし
subtitles.english: I'll always be by your side...

subtitles.original: いつでも一緒に笑える
subtitles.english: ...and we can always laugh together.

subtitles.original: 私をたくさん知って
subtitles.english: Get to know me a lot...

subtitles.original: たくさん好きって言って
subtitles.english: ...and say you like me a lot.

subtitles.original: わがままで朝も苦手
subtitles.english: I'm selfish and not a morning person...

subtitles.original: ドジだしダメダメだけど
subtitles.english: ...I'm clumsy and useless, but...

subtitles.original: それでも私のことを
subtitles.english: Even so, please keep...

subtitles.original: 見ててね
subtitles.english: ...looking at me.

subtitles.original: 描く夢の未来へ
subtitles.english: Toward the future of the dreams I draw...

subtitles.original: 続く道は
subtitles.english: ...the path that continues...

subtitles.original: 君と歩めますように
subtitles.english: ...I hope to walk it with you.

subtitles.original: ねえ もっと好きになってもらいたいんだ
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to like me even more.

subtitles.original: 頭の中は君ばっかって
subtitles.english: My head is filled only with you...

subtitles.original: 嘘なんてついてないで
subtitles.english: ...don't lie like that.

subtitles.original: あぁ もやもやしちゃうわ あぁ
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm getting all restless, ah!

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと好きでいろ！
subtitles.english: Keep liking me forever and ever!

subtitles.original: 心の奥まで入れちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: So much that I get deep into your heart.

subtitles.original: こっち向いててよね ダーリン
subtitles.english: Keep facing this way, darling.

subtitles.original: あぁ 離さないから絶対に
subtitles.english: Ah, because I'll never let you go!

subtitles.original: 君がいるから私
subtitles.english: Because you are here...

subtitles.original: いつでも頑張れるんだ
subtitles.english: ...I can always do my best.

subtitles.original: 落ち込んで悲しくたって
subtitles.english: Even if I'm feeling down and sad...

subtitles.original: 君がいるから！
subtitles.english: ...it's because you are here!

subtitles.original: みんなのおかげでここまで来ることが出来たよ！
subtitles.english: Thanks to everyone, I was able to come this far!
